sqlMap.sql:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.DPL_ID , A.DPL_NM , A.DPL_VER , A.DPL_DT , A.DPL_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.DPL_USR_ID, 1) DPL_USR_NM , REGEXP_REPLACE (A.DPL_DESC ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , '\n' ) AS DPL_DESC , A.DPL_STS_CD , SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00001', A.DPL_STS_CD, '1') AS DPL_STS_NM , A.DPL_TYPE_CD , SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00003', A.DPL_TYPE_CD, '1') AS DPL_TYPE_NM , A.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD , SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00004', A.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD, '1') AS DPL_AUTO_AFTER_NM , A.DPL_AUTO_DTM , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.DPL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(A.DPL_AUTO_DTM,'HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DPL_ST_DTM , A.DPL_RESTORE_CD , SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00005', A.DPL_RESTORE_CD, '1') AS DPL_RESTORE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' ORDER BY A.DPL_DT DESC, A.REG_DTM DESC ) A WHERE 1=1 UPPER(A.DPL_VER) LIKE '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# )||'%' UPPER(A.DPL_NM) LIKE '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# )||'%' A.DPL_USR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%' A.DPL_DESC LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%' A.DPL_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#

SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.CI_ID , A.TICKET_ID , A.DPL_ID , A.DPL_TYPE_CD , B.JEN_ID , C.JEN_NM , C.JEN_USR_ID , C.JEN_USR_TOK , C.JEN_URL , C.JEN_DESC , B.JOB_ID , B.JOB_START_ORD , D.JOB_DESC , D.JOB_TYPE_CD , SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00002', D.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS JOB_TYPE_NM , D.JOB_URL , D.JOB_RESTORE_ID , D.JOB_TOK , E.JOB_DESC AS JOB_RESTORE_DESC , F.BLD_NUM , F.BLD_RESULT , F.BLD_RESULT_CD , F.BLD_DURATION_TM , F.BLD_START_DTM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1000 A INNER JOIN DPL1100 B ON (A.CI_ID = B.CI_ID AND A.TICKET_ID = B.TICKET_ID AND A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID AND A.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' AND B.USE_CD = '01') INNER JOIN JEN1000 C ON (B.JEN_ID = C.JEN_ID AND C.USE_CD = '01' AND C.DEL_CD = '02') INNER JOIN JEN1100 D ON (B.JEN_ID = D.JEN_ID AND B.JOB_ID = D.JOB_ID AND D.USE_CD = '01') LEFT JOIN JEN1100 E ON (D.JEN_ID = E.JEN_ID AND D.JOB_RESTORE_ID = E.JOB_ID AND E.USE_CD = '01')
INNER JOIN
LEFT JOIN
( SELECT Z.* FROM JEN1200 Z INNER JOIN (SELECT JEN_ID, JOB_ID, MAX(BLD_NUM) AS BLD_NUM FROM JEN1200 GROUP BY JEN_ID, JOB_ID) Y
ON (Z.JEN_ID = Y.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = Y.JOB_ID AND Z.BLD_NUM = Y.BLD_NUM) ) F ON (B.JEN_ID = F.JEN_ID AND B.JOB_ID = F.JOB_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.CI_ID = #ciId# AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId#
AND UPPER( C.JEN_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( C.JEN_URL ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( B.JOB_ID ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND D.JOB_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#
ORDER BY B.JOB_START_ORD

SELECT A.CI_ID , A.TICKET_ID , A.DPL_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.JOB_PARAM_KEY , A.JOB_PARAM_VAL , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1101 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CI_ID = #ciId# AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId#
sqlMap.select:
/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1000DeployVerInfo - 배포 계획 단일 정보 가져오기 */ SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DPL_ID = #dplId#
/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1100DeployJobList - 배포 계획 배정 JOB 목록 가져오기 */
sqlMap.update: /* dpl1000DAO.deleteDpl100DeployVerInfo - 배포 계획 정보 삭제 */ UPDATE DPL1000 A SET A.DPL_DEL_CD = '01' WHERE 1=1 AND A.CI_ID = #ciId# AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId#

/* dpl1000DAO.updateDpl1000DeployVerInfo - 배포 계획 정보 수정 */ UPDATE DPL1000 SET DPL_NM = #dplNm# , DPL_VER = #dplVer# , DPL_DT = #dplDt# , DPL_USR_ID = #dplUsrId# , DPL_DESC = #dplDesc# , DPL_STS_CD = #dplStsCd# , DPL_TYPE_CD = #dplTypeCd# , DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD= #dplAutoAfterCd# , DPL_AUTO_DTM = #dplAutoDtm# , DPL_RESTORE_CD = #dplRestoreCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #regUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #regUsrIp#
WHERE 1=1 AND CI_ID = #ciId# AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND DPL_ID = #dplId#

/* dpl1000DAO.updateDpl1000DplStsCdInfo - 배포 계획 배포 상태 수정 */ UPDATE DPL1000 SET DPL_STS_CD = #dplStsCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND CI_ID = #ciId# AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND DPL_ID = #dplId#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RN , DPL_ID , DPL_NM , DPL_DT , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(DPL_USR_ID, 1) DPL_USR_ID , DPL_DESC , DPL_STS_CD , SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00001', DPL_STS_CD, '1') AS DPL_STS_NM , DPL_VER , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(DPL_USR_ID, 1) AS DPL_USR_NM
FROM DPL1000 A
A.DPL_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(DPL_USR_ID, 1) LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
A.DPL_VER LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
sqlMap.insert:
/* dpl1000DAO.insertDpl1100DeployJobInfo - 배포 JOB 등록 */ INSERT INTO DPL1100 ( CI_ID ,TICKET_ID ,DPL_ID ,JEN_ID ,JOB_ID ,JOB_START_ORD ,USE_CD ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP
) VALUES ( #ciId# ,#ticketId# ,#dplId# ,#jenId# ,#jobId# ,#jobStartOrd# ,'01' ,SYSDATE ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: /* dpl1000DAO.deleteDpl1100DplJobList - 배포계획에 등록된 Job 삭제 */ DELETE FROM DPL1100 WHERE 1=1 AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_ID = #jobId#
sqlMap.insert: /* dpl1000DAO.insertDpl1101ParameterInfo - 빌드 파라미터 등록 */ INSERT INTO DPL1101 ( CI_ID ,TICKET_ID ,DPL_ID ,JEN_ID ,JOB_ID ,JOB_PARAM_KEY ,JOB_PARAM_VAL ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #ciId# ,#ticketId# ,#dplId# ,#jenId# ,#jobId# ,#jobParamKey# ,#jobParamVal# ,NOW() ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete:
/* dpl1000DAO.deleteDpl1101ParameterInfo - 빌드 파라미터 정보 삭제 */ DELETE FROM DPL1101 WHERE 1=1
AND CI_ID = #ciId#
AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId#
AND DPL_ID = #dplId#
AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_ID = #jobId#
sqlMap.select: /* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1200DplJobBuildInfo - 배포 계획에 배정된 JOB에 해당하는 배포 실행 이력 조회 */ SELECT A.DPL_ID ,SF_DPL1000_DPL_INFO(A.DPL_ID,'1') AS DPL_NM ,A.JEN_ID ,A.JOB_ID ,B.JOB_RESTORE_ID ,A.BLD_SEQ ,A.BLD_NUM ,C.BLD_MAIN_NUM ,A.BLD_RESULT ,A.BLD_DURATION_TM ,A.BLD_START_DTM ,A.BLD_CONSOLE_LOG ,C.BLD_NUM AS BLD_RESTORE_NUM ,C.BLD_RESULT AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT ,C.BLD_CONSOLE_LOG AS BLD_CONSOLE_RESTORE_LOG ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1200 A LEFT JOIN JEN1100 B ON(B.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND B.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DPL1200 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.BLD_SEQ = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z PK_DPL1200 ) */ BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1200 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_ID = Y.DPL_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = Y.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = Y.JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) C ON (C.DPL_ID = A.DPL_ID AND C.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND C.JOB_ID = B.JOB_RESTORE_ID AND C.BLD_MAIN_NUM = A.BLD_NUM) WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.BLD_SEQ = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z PK_DPL1200 ) */ BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1200 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_ID = A.DPL_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 )

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1200DplSelBuildInfoAjax - 배포 실행 이력 단건 조회 */ SELECT A.DPL_ID ,SF_DPL1000_DPL_INFO(A.DPL_ID,'1') AS DPL_NM ,A.JEN_ID ,A.JOB_ID ,B.JOB_RESTORE_ID ,A.BLD_SEQ ,A.BLD_NUM ,A.BLD_MAIN_NUM ,A.BLD_RESULT ,A.BLD_DURATION_TM ,A.BLD_START_DTM ,A.BLD_CONSOLE_LOG ,'' AS BLD_RESTORE_NUM ,'' AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT ,'' AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT_MSG ,'' AS BLD_CONSOLE_RESTORE_LOG ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1200 A LEFT JOIN JEN1100 B ON(B.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND B.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.BLD_SEQ = #bldSeq#

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1000DplHistoryList - 배포 계획 실행,수정이력 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'BLD' AS TYPE , A.DPL_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_SEQ , A.BLD_NUM , A.BLD_RESULT AS RESULT ,SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00002', Z.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS TYPE_NM , A.REG_DTM AS START_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, 1) AS REG_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, 6) AS REG_USR_IMG FROM DPL1200 A LEFT JOIN JEN1100 Z ON(Z.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# ) C ORDER BY C.START_DTM DESC

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1200DplBldNumList - Job 빌드 목록 조회 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.DPL_ID ,A.JEN_ID ,A.JOB_ID ,A.BLD_SEQ ,A.BLD_NUM ,A.BLD_RESULT ,A.BLD_DURATION_TM ,A.BLD_START_DTM ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, 1) AS REG_USR_NM ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1200 A JOIN ( SELECT Z.DPL_ID, Z.JEN_ID, Z.JOB_ID, Z.BLD_NUM,MAX(BLD_SEQ) AS MAX_BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1200 Z WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Z.DPL_ID, Z.JEN_ID, Z.JOB_ID, Z.BLD_NUM ) B ON(A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND A.JOB_ID = B.JOB_ID AND A.BLD_NUM = B.BLD_NUM AND A.BLD_SEQ = B.MAX_BLD_SEQ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.BLD_NUM > 0 AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# ORDER BY A.BLD_NUM DESC ) T1 ) T2 WHERE 1=1
AND RN <= 100 /* 100건까지 */

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1000AllDplList - 모든 배포계획 자동배포 목록 가져오기 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.DPL_ID , A.DPL_NM , A.DPL_VER , A.DPL_DT , A.DPL_USR_ID , A.DPL_DESC , A.DPL_STS_CD , A.DPL_TYPE_CD , A.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD , A.DPL_AUTO_DTM , A.DPL_RESTORE_CD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.DPL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(A.DPL_AUTO_DTM,'HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DPL_ST_DTM FROM DPL1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_STS_CD = '01' AND A.DPL_TYPE_CD = '01' AND A.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' ) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ST_DTM > SYSDATE ORDER BY A.DPL_ST_DTM
sqlMap.insert:
/* dpl1000DAO.insertDpl1201DeployBuildChgLogInfo - 배포 실행 변경 정보 등록 */ INSERT INTO DPL1201 ( DPL_ID ,JEN_ID ,JOB_ID ,BLD_SEQ ,CHG_TIMESTAMP ,CHG_DATE ,CHG_MSG ,CHG_REVISION ,CHG_USER ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP
) VALUES ( #dplId# ,#jenId# ,#jobId# ,#bldSeq# ,#timestamp# ,#date# ,#msg# ,#revision# ,#user# ,SYSDATE ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )

/* dpl1000DAO.insertDpl1201DeployBuildChgPathLogInfo - 배포 변경 파일 정보 등록 */ INSERT INTO DPL1202 ( DPL_ID ,JEN_ID ,JOB_ID ,BLD_SEQ ,CHG_REVISION ,EDIT_TYPE_CD ,FILE_PATH ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP
) VALUES ( #dplId# ,#jenId# ,#jobId# ,#bldSeq# ,#revision# ,#editTypeCd# ,#filePath# ,SYSDATE ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.select: /* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1201SvnChangeLogsList - 배포 실행 변경 정보 목록 조회 */ SELECT A.DPL_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_SEQ , A.CHG_REVISION , A.CHG_TIMESTAMP , A.CHG_DATE , A.CHG_MSG , A.CHG_USER , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1201 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.BLD_SEQ = #bldSeq# ORDER BY A.CHG_REVISION DESC

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1202SvnChangePathList - 배포 변경 파일 목록 조회 */ SELECT A.DPL_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_SEQ , A.CHG_REVISION , A.FILE_PATH , A.EDIT_TYPE_CD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1202 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.BLD_SEQ = #bldSeq# ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1200DplNoneResultList - 완료되지않은 배포 실행 이력 조회 */ SELECT Z.DPL_ID ,Z.JEN_ID ,Z.JOB_ID ,Z.BLD_SEQ ,Z.BLD_NUM ,Z.BLD_MAIN_NUM ,Z.BLD_RESULT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM DPL1200 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.BLD_SEQ = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z PK_DPL1200 ) */ BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1200 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_ID = Y.DPL_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = Y.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = Y.JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.BLD_RESULT_CD IN ('01','02')
sqlMap.insert:
/* dpl1000DAO.insertDpl1102DplBuildInfo - 배포 계획 실행 정보 등록 */ INSERT INTO DPL1102 ( CI_ID ,TICKET_ID ,JEN_ID ,JOB_ID ,DPL_ID ,BLD_NUM ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP
) VALUES ( #ciId# ,#ticketId# ,#jenId# ,#jobId# ,#dplId# ,#bldNum# ,SYSDATE ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete:
/* dpl1000DAO.deleteDpl1102DplActionInfo - 배포 계획 실행 정보 삭제 */ DELETE FROM DPL1102 WHERE 1=1
AND CI_ID = #ciId#
AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId#
AND DPL_ID = #dplId#
AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_ID = #jobId#
